title: How Not to Run a Competition
description:
In the 11th instalment of our artisanal hand-crafted high-fidelity podcast we prove that despite being able to bring up a LAMP stack in under 12 minutes we are utterly incapable of running a competition. Listen in and find out who the two, yes two, winners of Keir’s lunchbox are! We also discuss Keir’s (and Elliot’s) latest publication called Digest, chat about a new design trend, shine a light on a new screencasting service and ask if online comments are dead.

  • Digest
  • The Freelance Web
  • Hired podcast
  • Sound Studio
  • Hindenburg Systems
  • Quickcast
  • Should all web professionals be able to code?
  • Appropriate design
  • Disqus
  • Hipster logo

podcast.title: The Back to Front Show
podcast.description: The Back to Front show was started in 2013 by web industry veterans Keir Whitaker and Kieran Masterton. Over the first 40 episodes they have discussed everything from web design and development to startups and dog related tech. Today the focus has shifted and includes topics including remote working, working in the web industry, productivity, hipster beards and much more. Released irregularly but always produced with passion The Back to Front Show runs for around 40 minutes per episode and comes to you from the beautiful West Country in the UK. Thanks for listening.
